 The remainder of this structure is subject to change and should be considered private. More...
 

Detailed Description

Database object identity.

This object identifies a specific table or row.

Initialize with DB_OID_INITIALIZER.

See also
db_get_bookmark, db_goto_bookmark, db_lock, db_unlock

Field Documentation

◆ oid_tag

uint16_t db_oid_t::oid_tag

Object id tag.

Initialize value to 0 (DB_OID_TAG_NONE). All other values are reserved for internal use.

union { ... } db_oid_t::u
